汵字的基本解释

汵
gàn
古同“淦”，水由缝隙进入船中。

汵
hán
古同“涵”，水泽多；包容。

汵
cén
池。

汵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gàn］
［《集韻》古暗切，去勘，見。］
(1)水入船中。
(2)泥。

汵字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　汵； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页608第06
【唐韻】【集韻】?古暗切，音紺。與淦同。【說文】淦或从今作汵。水入舟隟也。一曰水名。　又【集韻】古南切，音弇。義同。　又鉏簪切，音岑。池也。　又【山海經】號山多汵石。【郭璞註】汵或音金。未詳。【水經注】引經作泠石。

汵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
汵字的起名意思

水入船中；泥。

Xun
Basic explanation of words
Xun
gàn
Gu Tong "Gan", water enters the ship through the gap.
Xun
hán
The ancient tongs "han", the water is more; tolerant.
Xun
cén
Pool.
Xun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gàn］
["Jiyun" ancient secretly cut, go to survey, see. ]
(1) Water enters the ship.
(2) Mud.
Xun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　汵; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 608 06
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ancient dark cut, cyanotic tone. Same as Gan. [Said the text] Gan or from now on for the flu. The water enters the boat. One is the name of the water.　[Jiyun] Ancient Nanqie, sound 弇. The same meaning.　I cut the hairpin again, sound Cen. Chi also.　[Shan Hai Jing] No. Mountain and many rocks. [Guo Pu's Note] Fen or Yin Jin. Unknown. 【Notes on Water Classics】Cite the scriptures as Lingshi.
Xun
